title: Vanglaini
subtitle: vanglaini.org
body: Created the front end website for Vanglaini, a newspapery agency from Mizoram. Using react and nextjs framework along with styling in tailwindcss.

title: Synod Archive
subtitle: offline
body: Created front end for Archival System used by the Synod Council of Mizoram, using nuxtjs, a popular vue framework.

title: LBAssociates
subtitle: lbassociates.in
body: Developed website for architect firm lbassociates at lbassociates.in using nextjs on the frontend and prismic.io as a headless cms and hosted on netlify.

title: BNCollege of Nursing
subtitle: bncollegeofnursingmizoram.com
body: Created website for Nursing College BNCollegeOfNursing at bncollegeofnursingmizoram.com using nextjs and netlify-cms as the cms, hosted on netlify.
